text: Prophecy is a 1979 American science fiction horror movie directed by John Frankenheimer and starring Robert Foxcroft, Armand Assante, Talia Shire, Burke Baynes, Richard A. Dysart and Tom McFadden. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == References == === Biography === * * ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1979 horror movies Category:1979 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American monster movies Category:Movies directed by John Frankenheimer Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Maine Category:Movies set in forests Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s monster movies Category:Movies about bears
title: Prophecy (movie)
